languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% damage with ranged attacks and gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.
languages.original_text: Великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} размечает на поле боя тыл — область 5×2. Все союзники в тылу наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% больше урона в дальнем бою и получают +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% к {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозному пробитию{/g} и +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}. Зону можно перемещать, применяя эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} снова.

traits.locale_text:
The Strategist marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +<u>5+2×(Strategist's INT bonus)</u>% ranged damage, gain +<u>5+2×(Strategist's INT bonus)</u>% overpenetration and +<u>5+(Strategist's FEL bonus)</u>% critical hit chance.
The rear can be moved by using this ability again.

The Strategist marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +<u>(5 + 2 × Strategist's INT bonus)</u>% ranged damage, gain +<u>(5 + 2 × Strategist's INT bonus)</u>% overpenetration and +<u>(5 + Strategist's FEL bonus)</u>% critical hit chance.
The rear can be moved by using this ability again.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% damage with ranged attacks and gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% damage with ranged attacks and gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.

languages.text: Великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} размечает на поле боя тыл — область 5×2. Все союзники в тылу наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% больше урона в дальнем бою и получают +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% к {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозному пробитию{/g} и +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}. Зону можно перемещать, применяя эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} снова.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% damage with ranged attacks and gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.

traits.locale_text: Стратег размечает на поле боя тыл — область 5×2. Все союзники в тылу наносят на (5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ стратега)% больше урона в дальнем бою и получают +(5 + 2 × бонус ИНТ стратега)% к сквозному пробитию и +(5 + бонус ОБЩ стратега)% к шансу критического попадания. Зону можно перемещать, применяя эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} снова.

Стратег размечает на поле боя тыл — область 5×2. Все союзники в тылу наносят на (5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ стратега)% больше урона в дальнем бою и получают +(5 + 2 × бонус ИНТ стратега)% к сквозному пробитию и +(5 + бонус ОБЩ стратега)% к шансу критического попадания. Зону можно перемещать, применяя эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} снова.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Стратег{/g} размечает на поле боя тыл — область 5×2. Все союзники в тылу наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} в дальнем бою и получают +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}сквозному пробитию{/g} и +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}. Зону можно перемещать, применяя эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} снова.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}可以在战场上标记一片5×2的区域，作为后方区域。后方区域内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}%，获得+{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}%{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}%。
再次使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，可以移动后方区域。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.

traits.locale_text:
战略大师可以在战场上标记一片5×2的区域，作为后方区域。后方区域内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}伤害提高<u>（5+2×战略大师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，获得+<u>（5+2×战略大师的智力加值）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}过度穿透{/g}效果，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}率提高<u>（5+战略大师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}加值）</u>%。
再次使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，可以移动后方区域。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}可以在战场上标记一片5×2的区域，作为后方区域。后方区域内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}%，获得+{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}%{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}效果，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}%。
再次使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，可以移动后方区域。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} designa como retaguardia una zona de 5×2 casillas en el campo de batalla. Todos los aliados presentes en la retaguardia infligen un +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de daño con ataques a distancia, ganan un +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g} y un +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g}.
La retaguardia puede desplazarse usando esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} otra vez.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% damage with ranged attacks and gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.

traits.locale_text:
El gran {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}estratega{/g} designa como retaguardia una zona de 5×2 casillas en el campo de batalla. Todos los aliados presentes en la retaguardia infligen un +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}, ganan un +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g} y un +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del estratega)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g}.
La retaguardia puede desplazarse usando esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} otra vez.

El gran {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}estratega{/g} designa como retaguardia una zona de 5×2 casillas en el campo de batalla. Todos los aliados presentes en la retaguardia infligen un +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}, ganan un +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g} y un +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g}.
La retaguardia puede desplazarse usando esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} otra vez.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} markiert auf dem Schlachtfeld eine Fläche von 5×2 Feldern — die Nachhut. Alle dortigen Verbündeten fügen +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % Schaden mit Fernkampf-Angriffen zu, erhalten +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g} und +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}.
Die Nachhut kann mithilfe dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} erneut verschoben werden.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% damage with ranged attacks and gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} markiert auf dem Schlachtfeld eine Fläche von 5×2 Feldern – die Nachhut. Alle dortigen Verbündeten fügen +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, erlangen +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g} und +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Großstrategen)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}.
Die Nachhut kann mithilfe dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} erneut verschoben werden.

Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} markiert auf dem Schlachtfeld eine Fläche von 5×2 Feldern – die Nachhut. Alle dortigen Verbündeten fügen +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, erlangen +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g} und +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}.
Die Nachhut kann mithilfe dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} erneut verschoben werden.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} délimite une zone de 5 × 2 cases sur le champ de bataille : la zone arrière. Tous les alliés présents dans la zone arrière infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de dégâts avec les attaques à distance, et bénéficient de +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g} et de +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}.
La zone arrière peut être déplacée en utilisant à nouveau cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% damage with ranged attacks and gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.

traits.locale_text:
Le Stratège délimite une zone de 5 × 2 cases sur le champ de bataille : la zone arrière. Tous les alliés présents dans la zone arrière infligent +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} du Stratège)</u> % de dégâts {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}, et bénéficient de +<u>(5 + 2 × bonus d'INT du Stratège)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}surpénétration{/g} et de +<u>(5 + bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Stratège)</u> % de chances d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
La zone arrière peut être déplacée en utilisant à nouveau cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}.

Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Stratège{/g} délimite une zone de 5 × 2 cases sur le champ de bataille : la zone arrière. Tous les alliés présents dans la zone arrière infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}, et bénéficient de +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g} et de +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g}.
La zone arrière peut être déplacée en utilisant à nouveau cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}が、戦場の5x2の範囲を後衛としてマークする。後衛内のすべての味方は{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% 増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}過貫通{/g}が+{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}%、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}が+{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}%される。
後衛はこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を再使用することで移動させられる。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.

traits.locale_text:
戦略家が、戦場の5x2の範囲を後衛としてマークする。後衛内のすべての味方は{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}ダメージが+<u>(5 + 2 × 戦略家の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>% 増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}過貫通{/g}が+<u>(5 + 2 × 戦略家のINTボーナス)</u>%、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率が+<u>(5 + 戦略家の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}ボーナス)</u>%される。
後衛はこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を再使用することで移動させられる。
